template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic end-to-end operational workflow in the {industry} domain that would require coordinating multiple tools, resolving at least one constraint, updating systems, and delivering a final outcome; output only the prompt text and keep it under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic end-to-end operational workflow in the manufacturing domain that would require coordinating multiple tools, resolving at least one constraint, updating systems, and delivering a final outcome; output only the prompt text and keep it under 40 words.

message.content: When a production line halts due to a missing component, update the inventory system, reschedule orders to prioritize urgent ones, and confirm the revised shipping timeline.
message.reasoning_content:
Okay, the user wants a single-sentence prompt under 40 words for a manufacturing workflow. Let me break down their requirements.

First, it needs to be realistic and end-to-end operational. Maybe something involving production, scheduling, or quality control. They mentioned coordinating multiple tools, so I should include different systems like MES or ERP.

Resolving at least one constraint is key. Maybe material shortages or machine downtime. Updating systems like inventory or schedules has to be part of the flow. The final outcome could be a shipped product or updated production plan.

Keeping it under 40 words means being concise. Let me draft: "When a production line halts due to a missing component, update the inventory system, reschedule orders to prioritize urgent ones, and confirm the revised shipping timeline." That covers tools (inventory, scheduling), constraint (missing part), updates, and outcome (timeline). Count the words... 28. Perfect.
